dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, December 21, 2005 4:34 PM
To: sales@thewebbrains.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
Date: Wed, 21 Dec 2005 18:14:51 -0800
From: The Web Brains <sales@thewebbrains.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC: tech@theplanet.com

Please look into this immeditely as a site hoested on your servers is using
our copyright content on their site:

Our Website - www.thewebbrains.com

Allegations of Copyright Violation / Digital Millennium Copyright Act

It has come to our notice that you are using our copyright content on your
websites http://www.adsinmedia.com and http://www.ccs-aus.com You are
requested to immediately remove all our content from all the pages of you
websites and update us within 24 hours as failure to oblige with our request
will result in legal consequences and notification of the same to all
related authorities.

We wait for your immediate reply.

Thanks

Amit Singh
General Manager
Manglik Web Solutions Pvt Ltd.
www.thewebbrains.com

Ps -  If i am sending it to a wrong address then provide us correct email id
of theplanet which deals with such matters.


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDqdhxvK/XpJs6oyURAiX4AJ4+PqLkoEPpI0j4vKa7NERCff4B+ACfV7Cj
aoo42rHUkyGNH9p6/RFJpxU=
=U+LJ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
